articles.title: Casemiro called Man United chief John Murtough hours after watching their loss at Brentford - Daily Mail
articles.description: United were in advanced negotiations with the Real Madrid superstar when they were humiliated in Erik ten Hag's first away game, followed closely on television by Casemiro who was still in Spain.
articles.content:
Manchester United were convinced Casemiro would be the real deal at Old Trafford by an encouraging phone call he made after their 4-0 defeat at Brentford in August.

articles.title: Arsenal 'eyeing Vitoria Guimaraes defensive midfielder Ibrahima Bamba with player valued at £26.5m' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Arsenal are reportedly keeping tabs on Vitoria Guimaraes's defensive midfielder Ibrahima Bamba with the player having impressed during the start of this season in Portugal.
articles.content:
Arsenal are reportedly keeping tabs on Vitoria Guimaraess defensive midfielder Ibrahima Bamba.

articles.title: FIFA created this sick joke of a Qatar World Cup... begging us to look away now is laughable - Daily Mail
